title: Astrobrite - Starjuicetorch [shoegazer]
description:
Astrobrite - Starjuicetorch
Bootleg
Compiled in: 2008

Astrobrite is a shoegazer supergroup led by Scott Cortez (of Lovesliescrushing, STAR and other projects) and which also included over the time members of Mahogany, Alison&#039;s Halo, Xebec, Majesty Crush, etc. Unlike many such bands, they put a great accent on guitar noise (the songs are compared to a "jet engine hum lullaby") - or, otherwise said, they sound a lot like the noisy style of My Bloody Valentine, Loveless-era. You should start with their first LP, "Crush", if you&#039;re new to Astrobrite. Those who are already familiar with the band can rest assured - lots of shoegazing fun awaits here. Bootleg contains unreleased or at least very rare songs.

note: Most of the tracks were titled by me, as they were untitled, and I&#039;ve tried to bring the song titles as close to the Astrobrite style as I could.
